parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

recordIndicator.description: It specifies the type of record that is loaded

groupID.description: It specifies the dividend Group for which the dividend is related.

receiveMode.description: It specifies the mode in which the rate is received

externalSecurityIDCodeType.description: External ID provider. For Example: 00 - External Depositary Reference, 01 - Telekurs, 03 - SEDOL etc.LOV is available from CMESS table TYP_IDVAL

paymentCurrency.description: It specifies the TA fund currecy. Through this field and in association with securityExternalIdType and securityExternalId, system identifies the Fund and share class for which the the dividend is to be given.This defined in 3 letter ISO code, Eg: EUR, USD, INR etc.LOV is available from CMESS table TYP_IDVAL

TFCNumber.description: Trust fund company ID. Allowed values are from the list of TFCs in MFGI

TAFundCode.description: The fund in which the shareholder will place the transaction.Allowed values are from the list of Fund IDs in MFGI.

shareClassCode.description: Type of fund share class. Allowed values are from the list of share classes in MFGI.

dividendRates.description: Dividend amount per unit of holding, to be given

TISDValues.description: Taxable interest amount per share for distributions for transparent TA Fund share classes

flgGroupUpdateOnly.description: Flag to indicate end of a dividend period and no dividend has to be paid, share groups have to be updated. Allowed values are Y = (to enable), N = (to disable) or Null (=N)

incomeType.description: It specifies whether the distribution is a UK dividend income distribution or a UK interest income distribution. The allowed values are: 01 - UK Distribution Dividend Income, 02 - UK Distribution Interest IncomeLOV is available from CMESS table RE_INCMTYP

distributionType.description: It specifies the dividend distribution type if the fund is in scope of UK distribution. For example : 01 - Final Distribution, 02 - Interim DistributionLOV is available from CMESS table RE_DISTTYP

frankedIncome.description: It specifies the tax credit attached to the dividend to avoid dual taxation. It is related to UK distribution

unfrankedNonForeignIncome.description: It specifies the income from that do not have tax credit associated.

unfrankedForeignIncome.description: Unfrank income to a foreign resident

corporationTaxAmount.description: It specifies the Corporation Tax amount of this Distribution. Only for display and information on UK details screen.

corporationTaxRate.description: It specifies the Corporation Tax amount per unit of this Distribution. Only for display and information on UK details screen
